results.title: Metformin ameliorates sepsis-induced brain injury by inhibiting apoptosis, oxidative stress and neuroinflammation via the PI3K/Akt signaling pathway
results.text_hl: Previous studies have suggested that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ provides neuroprotective effects against @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Injuries_Traumatic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000070642 @@@brain trauma@@@ and other @DISEASE_Brain_Damage_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D001925 @@@brain damage@@@, but whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ protects a @DISEASE_Arthritis_Infectious @DISEASE_MESH:D001170 @@@septic@@@ brain remains unknown.
